org.jetel.util

Class CommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.CommandBuilder

  • public class CommandBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating command from string pieces and parameters
    Since:
    Aug 14, 2007

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandBuilder(java.lang.String command)
      Creates command object with default parameter delimiter (' '), end char ('\n') and switch mark ("-")

      • addParameterWithPrefixClauseConditionally

        public boolean addParameterWithPrefixClauseConditionally(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                boolean addPrefix,
                                                java.lang.String paramName)
        if paramName is in properties adds to the end of command: "[ prefix] paramName=paramValue"
        Parameters:
        prefix - string to write before paramName
        addPrefix - indicates if write prefix or not
        paramName -
        Returns:
        true if prefix was written (parmName is among parameters)

      • addParameterSpecialWithPrefixClauseConditionally

        public boolean addParameterSpecialWithPrefixClauseConditionally(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                       boolean addPrefix,
                                                       java.lang.String paramName,
                                                       java.lang.String equalChar)
        if paramName is in properties adds to the end of command: "[ prefix] paramNameequalCharparamValue"
        Parameters:
        prefix - string to write before paramName
        addPrefix - indicates if write prefix or not
        paramName -
        equalChar - string, which will be written between paramName and paramValue
        Returns:
        true if prefix was written (parmName is among parameters)

        public boolean addBooleanParameterWithPrefixClauseConditionally(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                       boolean addPrefix,
                                                       java.lang.String paramName)
        if paramName is in properties and has TRUE value adds to the end of command: "[ prefix] paramName"
        Parameters:
        prefix - string to write before paramName
        addPrefix - indicates if write prefix or not
        paramName -
        Returns:
        true if prefix was written (= paramName found and has "true" value)
